wallet.createWalletTips: Please ensure that your wallet is created by yourself, and we will not store your wallet information.
wallet.passwordTips: Please keep your password safe as we do not store it. If you lose your password, you will be unable to unlock your wallet.
wallet.mnemonicTips: This is the only way to restore your wallet. Please keep it safe and do not share it with anyone.
wallet.mnemonicTips2: Store it somewhere safe and secret. If you lose it, you will lose access to your wallet.
wallet.passwordAtLeast: Password must be at least 8 characters
wallet.receiveTips: Only send BTC and Ordinals NFTs to this wallet.
